#labels Featured,Phase-Deploy
= Unical OpenGL First Person Shooter =

=== Install ===

Download sources from here:<br>
http://unical-gl-shooter.googlecode.com/files/unical-gl-shooter.zip

Extract it in your directory: <br>
`# unzip unical-gl-shooter.zip -d ~/unical-gl-shooter`

Compile it: <br>
`# cd ~/unical-gl-shooter`<br>
`# make`

Start the game: <br>
  `# ./game`

===== SVN =====

To import the project from SVN:<br>
`# svn checkout http://unical-gl-shooter.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ unical-gl-shooter`
